question.title: Use customized properties of ObjectMapper in a JsonSerializer
question.body:
Is it possible to somehow customize an ObjectMapper instance so that I can access this customization in a JsonSerializer?

Let's assume that I can create the ObjectMapper myself but I don't have access over the POJOs that are serialized. Further assume that the JsonSerializer is shared with a lot of projects.

I'd like to have a feature, just like one of the built-in MapperFeatures, that toggles something. In my JsonSerializer I want to check whether the feature is enabled and serialize one way or the other.

Here is the signature of serialize:

public void serialize(ZonedDateTime date, JsonGenerator generator, SerializerProvider provider) throws IOException {
